mainSequence.step: The Warehouse Employee asks to configure the AGVs available on the warehouse
The System requests data for agvDock from the Warehouse Employee
The Warehouse Employee types the requested data
The System requests data for shortDescription, model, maximumWeight, maximumVolume, baseLocation, status, currentTask from the Warehouse Employee
The Warehouse Employee types the requested data
The System informs the Warehouse Employee of the successful completion of the operations
